content:
What a wonderful coincidence! It sounds like the universe is nudging you to create something beautiful.

Congratulations on producing great sketches in your life drawing class, by the way! That's fantastic. And now, with Monet's garden as your inspiration, I'm sure your watercolor piece will be stunning.

Remember to have fun and experiment with different techniques and colors to capture the essence of Monet's garden. Don't be afraid to take liberties and add your own personal touch to the piece. After all, art is all about expression and interpretation.

If you'd like, you can share your progress or final piece with me. I'd love to see how it turns out and offer any feedback or encouragement along the way.

Good luck, and happy creating!
